#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(mqtt_logger)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES -lconfig++ -lsqlite3 -lpaho-mqttpp3 -lpaho-mqtt3as)
add_executable(mqtt_logger mqtt_logger.cpp mqtt_logger_constants.h mqtt_logger_config.cpp mqtt_logger_config.h mqtt_logger_constants.h mqtt_database.h mqtt_database.h mqtt_message.h mqtt_database.cpp mqtt_handler.h mqtt_handler.cpp mqtt_handler.cpp mqtt_handler.h mqtt_handler_action_listener.h mqtt_handler_action_listener.cpp Imqtt_subscribe_callback.h db_callback.h)
target_include_directories(mqtt_logger PRIVATE)
target_include_directories(mqtt_logger PUBLIC)
target_link_libraries(mqtt_logger "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
set_property(TARGET mqtt_logger PROPERTY CXX_STANDARD 17)
